mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_FOLLOW WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and FOLLOW_ID = #{followId}
mapper.select: select a.follow, b.fans from (select count(*) as follow from USER_FOLLOW where USER_ID = #{userId}) a, (select count(*) as fans from USER_FOLLOW where FOLLOW_ID = #{userId}) b
